level.heading: Special restrictions.
level.text: ยง 27-309 Special restrictions. The provisions of this subchapter shall not authorize any projections beyond the street line on those streets where removal of all, or certain, projects has been directed by any action of the board of estimate or the former board of estimate and apportionment, or which has been, or may be, directed by any action of the council or the board of estimate, except those projections that are permitted in conformity with such actions.
